name: peti-ui
description: A dark colored UI theme for Pulsar.

themeColor.title: Theme Color
themeColor.description: Select a default theme color. If you don't notice a difference, you may have to reload Atom to see them.

fontFamily.title: Font Family
fontFamily.description: Set the default font. If you don't notice a difference, you may have to reload Atom to see them.

compactView.title: Compact Mode
compactView.description: Enable this is you prefer less padding in your workspace.

disableAnimations.title: Disable Animations
disableAnimations.description: Select this if you want to disable animations.

displayIgnored.title: Display Ignored Files
displayIgnored.description: Enable this if you would like to not see ignored files at all (as opposed to simple muting the style)

hideTabs.title: Hide Tabs
hideTabs.description: Enable this if you prefer to rely on the sidebar for nagivation and don't want to see tabs at all.

hideDocumentTitle.title: Hide Current Document Title
hideDocumentTitle.description: Enable this if you want to hide the main window title

hideTitleBar.title: Hide Title Bar
hideTitleBar.description: Enable this if you want to completely hide the main window title bar

hideProjectTab.title: Hide Project Tab
hideProjectTab.description: Enable this if you want to remove the 'project' tab from the sidebar
